net.zzh.sec.spring

类 PersistenceJPAConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zzh.sec.spring.PersistenceJPAConfig

  • @Configuration
 @EnableTransactionManagement
 @ImportResource(value="classpath*:*secPersistenceConfig.xml")
 @ComponentScan(value={"net.zzh.sec.persistence","net.zzh.common.persistence.service"})
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:persistence-${persistenceTarget:mysql}.properties")
public class PersistenceJPAConfig
extends java.lang.Object
